short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display big images in OpenSeadragon to enable zoom and pan.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenSeadragonizer adds the "View in OpenSeadragon" entry in the context menu of an image. When selected, the image is then displayed in an OpenSeadragon viewer, allowing easy zoom and pan.
